name: Tetris (itch) (x00F)
description:
Try to not let the tetrominoes (the game pieces) to the top of the screen by filling up the most amount of space at the bottom of the screen. Try to clear 100 lines! This is a recreation of Tetris by Alexey Pajitnov.

NOTE: PC Only

Check out Stage3-1 on Newgrounds!

Stage3-1 (newgrounds.com)

Check out Zigurous and his coding tutorials!
